Title: Aika-chan no Chikyuu
Description: ['The author of the manga ', Secrets of the World, " was only 12 years old, and she died days after completing it. Aika Tsubota's parents published her environmentally themed story in her memory, and this one-shot anime was the eventual result, sponsored in part by a charity opposing the pollution of the oceans. In 1995, ", Secrets of the World, ' itself was animated as a two-part video series under the auspices of the Japanese Department of the Environment.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)']
